body:
Hey Everyone
If you have been living under a rock and don't know what the Avicus Community YouTube Channel is click here! But this forum thread is for you to basically give suggestions (what content to put on the channel) and feedback (what we can improve on) feel free to add your suggestions and feedback and I will look into it!
body_tagged:

title: Avicus YouTube Channel (Suggestions/Feedback)

replies.body:
Make a new trailer for avicus, cause the old one is from avicore update! And new players may think: "Oh, avicus media is living under a rock" :D
Only five videos?
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
The YouTube channel. It doesn't seem to get enough support and the content is too different. I've noticed the original videos on the players channels get more views than the ones on the Avicus one. Also I think it only has like 30ish subs? Which isn't enough to make any sort of an impact IMO.

Edit: it would be nice if YouTubers on Avicus like yourself, Vlad, Tyn, Porkey and even Nova were able to get together to do some kind of advertisement for the AV channel.
